description: Lightweight, high-performance pants built for comfort and protection on or off water. Waterproof-breathable multilayered construction sheds water and wind while a soft-touch lining delivers next-to-skin comfort. Zip hand pockets, articulated knees, and bottom leg zips provide added utility and comfort.
name: Columbia Sportswear PFG Omni-Tech 3D Pants, 32" Inseam - Mens
